user_query: My friend is planning a backpacking trip across multiple countries and needs to know which vaccinations are required for each country. Can you provide a list of recommended vaccinations for each country? Additionally, they would like to calculate the carbon footprint of their car travel between cities using the distance of 200 km and a medium diesel car. Lastly, they are curious about the air quality health index based on ground-level ozone, nitrogen dioxide, and particulate matter levels in their current location.

TaskList.description: Gather the list of countries the user will visit and check for recommended vaccinations for each.
Calculate the carbon footprint of the car travel based on the distance (200 km) and vehicle type (medium diesel car).
Fetch the air quality health index based on the current levels of ground-level ozone, nitrogen dioxide, and particulate matter.
